arts.ttl: Official: Barcelona starting lineup against Girona
arts.sum: FC Barcelona have revealed their starting lineup for the clash against Girona, and as expected, Hansi Flick has had to make significant changes to his attack due to injuries. With Robert Lewandowski, Ferran Torres, and Dani Olmo all unavailable, Flick has turned to Marcus Rashford to lead the line.
